mil7.4.1:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘pathaviyā pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.4.1:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, pathavī iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni kappūrāgarutagaracandanakuṅkumādīni ākirantepi pittasemhapubbaruhirasedamedakheḷasiṅghāṇikalasikamuttakarīsādīni ākirantepi tādisāyeva;

mil7.4.1:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena iṭṭhāniṭṭhe lābhālābhe yasāyase nindāpasaṃsāya sukhadukkhe sabbattha tādināyeva bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.1:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pathaviyā paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.1:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pathavī maṇḍanavibhūsanāpagatā sakagandhaparibhāvitā;

mil7.4.1:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vibhūsanāpagatena sakasīlagandhaparibhāvitena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.1:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pathaviyā dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.1:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pathavī nirantarā akhaṇḍacchiddā asusirā bahalā ghanā vitthiṇṇā;

mil7.4.1:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nirantaramakhaṇḍacchiddamasusirabahalaghanavitthiṇṇasīlena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.1:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pathaviyā tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.1:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pathavī gāmanigamanagarajanapadarukkhapabbatanadītaḷākapokkharaṇīmigapakkhimanujanaranārigaṇaṃ dhārentīpi akilāsu hoti;

mil7.4.1:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ovadantenapi anusāsantenapi viññāpentenapi sandassentenapi samādapentenapi samuttejentenapi sampahaṃsentenapi dhammadesanāsu akilāsunā bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.1:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pathaviyā catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.1:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena anunayappaṭighavippamuttena pathavisamena cetasā viharitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.1:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pathaviyā pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.1:5.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, upāsikāya cūḷasubhaddāya sakasamaṇe parikittayamānāya—

mil7.4.10:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cakkavattissa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.4.10:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, cakkavattī catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ saṅgaṇhāti;

mil7.4.10:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena catassannaṃ parisānaṃ mānasaṃ saṅgahetabbaṃ anuggahetabbaṃ sampahaṃsetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.10:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.10:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa vijite corā na uṭṭhahanti;

mil7.4.10:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kāmarāgabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakkā na uppādetabbā.

mil7.4.10:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.10:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattī divase divase samuddapariyantaṃ mahāpathaviṃ anuyāyati kalyāṇapāpakāni vicinamāno;

mil7.4.10:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ divase divase paccavekkhitabbaṃ ‘kiṃ nu kho me imehi tīhi ṭhānehi anupavajjassa divaso vītivattatī’ti.

mil7.4.10:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.10:5.1.pli: ‘Kathambhūtassa me rattindivā vītivattantīti pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabban’ti.

mil7.4.10:6.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa abbhantarabāhirārakkhā susaṃvihitā hoti;

mil7.4.10:6.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena abbhantarānaṃ bāhirānaṃ kilesānaṃ ārakkhāya satidovāriko ṭhapetabbo.

mil7.4.10:6.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.10:7.1.pli: ‘Satidovāriko, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako akusalaṃ pajahati kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti, suddhamattānaṃ pariharatī’”ti.

mil7.4.2:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘āpassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.4.2:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kuhanalapananemittakanippesikataṃ apanetvā susaṇṭhitamakampitamaluḷitasabhāvaparisuddhācārena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.2:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, āpassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.2:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattesu khantimettānuddayasampannena hitesinā anukampakena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.2:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, āpassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.2:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, āpo asuciṃ suciṃ karoti;

mil7.4.2:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena gāme vā araññe vā upajjhāye upajjhāyamattesu ācariye ācariyamattesu sabbattha anadhikaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ anavasesakārinā.

mil7.4.2:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, āpassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.2:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena appicchasantuṭṭhapavivittapaṭisallānena satataṃ sabbalokamabhipatthitena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.2:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, āpassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.2:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, āpo na kassaci ahitamupadahati;

mil7.4.2:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena parabhaṇḍanakalahaviggahavivādarittajjhānaaratijananaṃ kāyavacīcittehi pāpakaṃ na karaṇīyaṃ.

mil7.4.2:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, āpassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.3:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘tejassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.4.3:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ye te abbhantarā vā bāhirā vā kilesā iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanā, sabbe te ñāṇagginā ḍahitabbā.

mil7.4.3:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, tejassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.3:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, tejo niddayo akāruṇiko;

mil7.4.3:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbakilesesu kāruññānuddayā na kātabbā.

mil7.4.3:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, tejassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.3:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, tejo sītaṃ paṭihanati;

mil7.4.3:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vīriyasantāpatejaṃ abhijanetvā kilesā paṭihantabbā.

mil7.4.3:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, tejassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.3:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, tejo anunayappaṭighavippamutto uṇhamabhijaneti;

mil7.4.3:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena anunayappaṭighavippamuttena tejosamena cetasā viharitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.3:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, tejassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.3:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, tejo andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dassayati;

mil7.4.3:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ñāṇālokaṃ dassayitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.3:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, tejassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.3:5.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena sakaṃ puttaṃ rāhulaṃ ovadantena—

mil7.4.3:6.2.pli: Tejosamaṃ hi te, rāhula, bhāvanaṃ bhāvayato uppannā manāpāmanāpā phassā cittaṃ na pariyādāya ṭhassantī’”ti.

mil7.4.4:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘vāyussa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.4.4:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vimuttivarakusumapupphitārammaṇavanantare ramitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.4:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyussa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.4:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, vāyu dharaṇīruhapādapagaṇe mathayati;

mil7.4.4:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vanantaragatena saṅkhāre vicinantena kilesā mathayitabbā.

mil7.4.4:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyussa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.4:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, vāyu ākāse carati;

mil7.4.4:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena lokuttaradhammesu mānasaṃ sañcārayitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.4:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyussa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.4:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, vāyu gandhaṃ anubhavati;

mil7.4.4:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena attano sīlavarasurabhigandho anubhavitabbo.

mil7.4.4:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyussa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.4:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, vāyu nirālayo aniketavāsī;

mil7.4.4:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nirālayamaniketamasanthavena sabbattha vimuttena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.4:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyussa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.5:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘pabbatassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.4.5:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sammānane vimānane sakkāre asakkāre garukāre agarukāre yase ayase nindāya pasaṃsāya sukhe dukkhe iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu sabbattha rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbadhammesu rajanīyesu na rajjitabbaṃ, dussanīyesu na dussitabbaṃ, muyhanīyesu na muyhitabbaṃ, na kampitabbaṃ na calitabbaṃ, pabbatena viya acalena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.5:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pabbatassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.5:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pabbato thaddho na kenaci saṃsaṭṭho;

mil7.4.5:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena thaddhena asaṃsaṭṭhena bhavitabbaṃ, na kenaci saṃsaggo karaṇīyo.

mil7.4.5:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pabbatassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.5:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pabbate bījaṃ na virūhati;

mil7.4.5:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sakamānase kilesā na virūhāpetabbā.

mil7.4.5:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pabbatassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.5:9.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ñāṇaccuggatena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.5:9.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pabbatassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.5:11.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pabbato anunnato anonato;

mil7.4.5:11.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena unnatāvanati na karaṇīyā.

mil7.4.5:11.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pabbatassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.5:11.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, upāsikāya cūḷasubhaddāya sakasamaṇe parikittayamānāya—

mil7.4.6:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘ākāsassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.4.6:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbaso kilesehi agayhena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.6:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ākāsassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.6:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti saṅkhāresu mānasaṃ sañcārayitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.6:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ākāsassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.6:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbabhavapaṭisandhīsu mānasaṃ ubbejayitabbaṃ, assādo na kātabbo.

mil7.4.6:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ākāsassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.6:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, ākāso ananto appamāṇo aparimeyyo;

mil7.4.6:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena anantasīlena aparimitañāṇena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.6:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ākāsassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.6:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, ākāso alaggo asatto appatiṭṭhito apalibuddho;

mil7.4.6:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kule gaṇe lābhe āvāse palibodhe paccaye sabbakilesesu ca sabbattha alaggena bhavitabbaṃ, anāsattena appatiṭṭhitena apalibuddhena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.6:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ākāsassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.6:5.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena sakaṃ puttaṃ rāhulaṃ ovadantena—

mil7.4.6:6.2.pli: evameva kho tvaṃ, rāhula, ākāsasamaṃ bhāvanaṃ bhāvehi.

mil7.4.6:6.3.pli: Ākāsasamaṃ hi te, rāhula, bhāvanaṃ bhāvayato uppannā manāpāmanāpā phassā cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassantī’”ti.

mil7.4.7:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘candassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.4.7:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, cando sukkapakkhe udayanto uttaruttariṃ vaḍḍhati;

mil7.4.7:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācārasīlaguṇavattappaṭipattiyā āgamādhigame paṭisallāne satipaṭṭhāne indriyesu guttadvāratāya bhojane mattaññutāya jāgariyānuyoge uttaruttariṃ vaḍḍhitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.7:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, candassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.7:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uḷārena chandādhipatinā bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.7:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, candassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.7:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cando nisāya carati;

mil7.4.7:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pavivittena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.7:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, candassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.7:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sīlaketunā bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.7:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, candassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.7:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cando āyācitapatthito udeti;

mil7.4.7:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āyācitapatthitena kulāni upasaṅkamitabbāni.

mil7.4.7:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, candassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.7:5.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṃyuttanikāyavare ‘candūpamā, bhikkhave, kulāni upasaṅkamatha, apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā’”ti.

mil7.4.8:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sūriyassa satta aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni satta aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.4.8:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbakilesā anavasesaṃ parisosetabbā.

mil7.4.8:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.8:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyo tamandhakāraṃ vidhamati;

mil7.4.8:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbaṃ rāgatamaṃ dosatamaṃ mohatamaṃ mānatamaṃ diṭṭhitamaṃ kilesatamaṃ sabbaṃ duccaritatamaṃ vidhamayitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.8:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.8:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyo abhikkhaṇaṃ carati;

mil7.4.8:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena abhikkhaṇaṃ yoniso manasikāro kātabbo.

mil7.4.8:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.8:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇamālinā bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.8:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.8:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyo mahājanakāyaṃ santāpento carati;

mil7.4.8:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācārasīlaguṇavattappaṭipattiyā jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattiindriyabalabojjhaṅgasatipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādehi sadevako loko santāpayitabbo.

mil7.4.8:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.8:6.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyo rāhubhayā bhīto carati;

mil7.4.8:6.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena duccaritaduggativisamakantāravipākavinipātakilesajālajaṭite diṭṭhisaṅghāṭapaṭimukke kupathapakkhande kummaggapaṭipanne satte disvā mahatā saṃvegabhayena mānasaṃ saṃvejetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.8:6.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa chaṭṭhaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.8:7.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyo kalyāṇapāpake dasseti;

mil7.4.8:7.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena indriyabalabojjhaṅgasatipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādalokiyalokuttaradhammā dassetabbā.

mil7.4.8:7.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sūriyassa sattamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.9:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sakkassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.4.9:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ekantapavivekasukhābhiratena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.9:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sakkassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.9:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sakko deve disvā paggaṇhāti, hāsamabhijaneti;

mil7.4.9:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kusalesu dhammesu alīnamatanditaṃ santaṃ mānasaṃ paggahetabbaṃ, hāsamabhijanetabbaṃ, uṭṭhahitabbaṃ ghaṭitabbaṃ vāyamitabbaṃ.

mil7.4.9:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sakkassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.4.9:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sakkassa anabhirati nuppajjati;

mil7.4.9:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena suññāgāre anabhirati na uppādetabbā.

mil7.4.9:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sakkassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.1:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘upacikāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.5.1:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, upacikā upari chadanaṃ katvā attānaṃ pidahitvā gocarāya carati;

mil7.5.1:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sīlasaṃvarachadanaṃ katvā mānasaṃ pidahitvā piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ, sīlasaṃvarachadanena kho, mahārāja, yogī yogāvacaro sabbabhayasamatikkanto hoti.

mil7.5.1:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, upacikāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.10:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘hatthissa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.5.10:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, hatthī nāma caranto yeva pathaviṃ dāleti;

mil7.5.10:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kāyaṃ sammasamāneneva sabbe kilesā dāletabbā.

mil7.5.10:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, hatthissa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.10:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, hatthī sabbakāyeneva apaloketi, ujukaṃyeva pekkhati, na disāvidisā viloketi;

mil7.5.10:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbakāyena apalokinā bhavitabbaṃ, na disāvidisā viloketabbā, na uddhaṃ ulloketabbaṃ, na adho oloketabbaṃ, yugamattapekkhinā bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.5.10:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, hatthissa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.10:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, hatthī anibaddhasayano gocarāyamanugantvā na tameva desaṃ vāsatthamupagacchati, na dhuvappatiṭṭhālayo;

mil7.5.10:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena anibaddhasayanena bhavitabbaṃ, nirālayena piṇḍāya gantabbaṃ, yadi passati vipassako manuññaṃ patirūpaṃ ruciradese bhavaṃ maṇḍapaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā guhaṃ vā pabbhāraṃ vā, tattheva vāsamupagantabbaṃ, dhuvappatiṭṭhālayo na kātabbo.

mil7.5.10:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, hatthissa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.10:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, hatthī udakaṃ ogāhitvā sucivimalasītalasalilaparipuṇṇaṃ kumuduppalapadumapuṇḍarīkasañchannaṃ mahatimahantaṃ padumasaraṃ ogāhitvā kīḷati gajavarakīḷaṃ;

mil7.5.10:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sucivimalavippasannamanāviladhammavaravāripuṇṇaṃ vimuttikusumasañchannaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānapokkharaṇiṃ ogāhitvā ñāṇena saṅkhārā odhunitabbā vidhunitabbā, yogāvacarakīḷā kīḷitabbā.

mil7.5.10:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, hatthissa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.10:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, hatthī sato pādaṃ uddharati, sato pādaṃ nikkhipati;

mil7.5.10:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena satena sampajānena pādaṃ uddharitabbaṃ, satena sampajānena pādaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ, abhikkamapaṭikkame samiñjanapasāraṇe sabbattha satena sampajānena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.5.10:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, hatthissa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.2:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘biḷārassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.5.2:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, biḷāro guhāgatopi susiragatopi hammiyantaragatopi undūraṃyeva pariyesati;

mil7.5.2:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena gāmagatenāpi araññagatenāpi rukkhamūlagatenāpi suññāgāragatenāpi satataṃ samitaṃ appamattena kāyagatāsatibhojanaṃyeva pariyesitabbaṃ.

mil7.5.2:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, biḷārassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.2:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, biḷāro āsanneyeva gocaraṃ pariyesati;

mil7.5.2:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena imesuyeva pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassinā viharitabbaṃ ‘iti rūpaṃ iti rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo, iti vedanā iti vedanāya samudayo iti vedanāya atthaṅgamo, iti saññā iti saññāya samudayo iti saññāya atthaṅgamo, iti saṅkhārā iti saṅkhārānaṃ samudayo iti saṅkhārānaṃ atthaṅgamo, iti viññāṇaṃ iti viññāṇassa samudayo iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.

mil7.5.2:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, biḷārassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.3:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘undūrassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.5.3:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, undūro itocito ca vicaranto āhārūpāsīsako yeva carati;

mil7.5.3:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena itocito ca vicarantena yoniso manasikārūpāsīsakeneva bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.5.3:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, undūrassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.4:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘vicchikassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.5.4:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, vicchiko naṅgulāvudho naṅgulaṃ ussāpetvā carati;

mil7.5.4:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ñāṇāvudhena bhavitabbaṃ, ñāṇaṃ ussāpetvā viharitabbaṃ.

mil7.5.4:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vicchikassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
